pkgmetadata.longdescription: Arellano-Bond LASSO Estimator for Dynamic Linear Panel Models // Implements the Arellano-Bond estimation method combined with LASSO for dynamic linear panel models. See Chernozhukov et al. (2024) "Arellano-Bond LASSO Estimator for Dynamic Linear Panel Models". arXiv preprint doi:10.48550/arXiv.2402.00584.
